DOC.brief_summary: A follow-up intervention for the climacteric symptoms of nurses in Peking
DOC.brief_title: Chinese Health Investigation of Nurse Aging
DOC.detailed_description: As we all know,hormone replacement therapy (HRT) is the main therapy to climacteric symptoms.But HRT has also some disadvantages including breast cancer,cardiovascular disease and so on, especially long period of HRT. It makes us to find the non-hormone therapy. So we want to investigate the exercise on the effect of climacteric symptoms.Doing exercise is helpful for avoiding and treating many disease,including climacteric symptoms.In our previous research,we found that playing exercise can treat moderate climacteric symptoms.
DOC.criteria: they are nurse ,aged4055, lived in peking ,who are among perimenopausal women.
